San Francisco, CA, Full Time, H1B

Tapjoy is the leader in discovery, engagement, and monetization services for mobile applications. Our turnkey in-app advertising platform helps developers acquire cost-effective, high-value new users, drive engagement within their applications, and create incremental revenue by providing an ad-funded payment method.

The Tapjoy ad marketplace spans over 10,000 apps and 280 million global consumers on iOS, Android, Windows Phone 7 and other emerging mobile platforms, delivering more than ~1 million advertising actions per day to developers and brand advertisers. Tapjoy is headquartered in San Francisco with offices in London and Tokyo. Investors include InterWest Partners, North Bridge Venture Partners, D.E. Shaw Ventures, Rho Ventures and J.P. Morgan Asset Management.

You can view open positions at: http://tapjoy.jobscore.com/list

We are looking for frontend, backend (or fullstack) engineers. Designers, UI/UX folks are also welcome.
